FuncDef:
The ca id command specifies a certificate authority (CA) trusted by a PKI realm.
The undo ca id command deletes the CA trusted by a PKI realm. The ca id command specifies a certificate authority (CA) trusted by a PKI realm. The undo ca id command deletes the CA trusted by a PKI realm. By default, no trusted CA is configured in a PKI realm.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a CA trusted by a PKI realm.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive
characters, and can contain spaces.
